mapper.select: select ,b.name uname,b.identifier,c.name deptName,d.name placeName from man_apply a left join man_emp b on a.uid = b.id left join man_dept c on b.deptid = c.id left join man_place d on b.placeid = d.id WHERE a.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO man_apply(uid, type,leave_type, starttime, endtime, info,createtime) VALUES(#{ model.uid },#{ model.type },#{ model.leave_type },#{ model.starttime },#{ model.endtime },#{ model.info },unix_timestamp(now())*1000)
